preservations.name: 保持绘画风格

preservations.name: 保持细节特征

preservations.brief_zh: 同时保持原有的细节特征

preservations.name: 保留特征

preservations.brief_zh: 保持相同的面部特征、发型和表情

preservations.name: 保持画面平衡

other.name: 去除红框范围内马赛克
other.brief: remove mosaic within the red box and restore the repaired area to show clear figures' bodies and clothing
other.brief_zh: 去除红框范围内的马赛克并修复区域内的图像，显示清晰的人物身体和衣服

other.name: 去马赛克
other.brief: remove mosaic and restore the repaired area to show clear figures' bodies and clothing
other.brief_zh: 去除马赛克并修复区域内的图像，显示清晰的人物身体和衣服

other.name: 模糊图像高清化
other.brief: enhance image clarity while preserving original content and details
other.brief_zh: 将模糊图像高清化，保持原有内容和细节

other.name: 相机拍摄效果
other.brief: Convert the image into a realistic color photo style as if taken with a camera
other.brief_zh: 将图片转化为相机拍摄的真实彩色照片效果

other.name: 照片打光
other.brief: Transform the image into a sunset with soft lighting, while keeping the details and features of the characters unchanged
other.brief_zh: 将画面变成落日时分，柔和的光线，保持人物细节和特征不变

other.name: 定向阳光效果
other.brief: Add directional sunlight from window source. Increase brightness on lit areas. Create hard shadows with sharp edges. Set warm white color temperature. Add visible light rays and dust particles in beam
other.brief_zh: 添加来自窗户光源的定向阳光。增加照明区域的亮度。创建具有锐利边缘的硬阴影。设置暖白色色温。在光束中添加可见光线和灰尘颗粒

other.name: 美甲设计灵感
other.brief: Replace the fingernails of the characters with artistic graphic nails of cartoon different fruits
other.brief_zh: 用卡通不同水果的艺术图形指甲代替人物的指甲

other.name: 人物发型设计参考
other.brief: Replace the hairstyle of the characters with Wool curl perm
other.brief_zh: 用羊毛卷发烫发代替角色的发型

other.name: 毛茸茸材质替换
other.brief: replace logo with a furrey texture and green background
other.brief_zh: 用毛茸茸的纹理和绿色背景替换徽标

other.name: 修复老照片
other.brief: repair damaged photos while keeping the character unchanged
other.brief_zh: 修复破损照片，保持人物不变

other.name: 生成三视图
other.brief: generate three views for the model in the picture, front, side, and back, keeping the actions, clothing, and facial features completely consistent. White background.
other.brief_zh: 为图中的模型生成三视图，包括正面、侧面和背面，保持动作、服装和面部特征完全一致。白色背景。

other.name: IP转换三视图
other.brief: convert the IP in the image into three views: front, side, and back
other.brief_zh: 将图中的IP转换为三视图：正面、侧面和背面

other.name: 提取线稿
other.brief: extract image line drafts, use smooth black and white lines to represent, retain contour lines, white background, and keep the facial features, clothing details, and posture of the characters in the image unchanged
other.brief_zh: 提取图片线稿，用流畅的黑白线条表现，保留轮廓线，白色底，保持图中人物面容及服装细节、姿态不变

other.name: 线稿上色
other.brief: fill the draft with appropriate colors, watercolor or light color style, and draw it on textured watercolor paper
other.brief_zh: 填充线稿，将草稿图填充上合适的颜色，水彩画，淡彩风格，绘制在带纹理的水彩纸上

other.name: 全风格线稿上色
other.brief: fill black and white line draft images with colors,(The subject remains unchanged)
other.brief_zh: 用颜色填充黑白线条草稿图像（主题保持不变）

other.name: 深度图
other.brief: create depth maps for images
other.brief_zh: 制作图像的深度图

other.name: 黑白老照片上色
other.brief: color this photo
other.brief_zh: 给这张照片上色

other.name: 照片高清上色
other.brief: color and high-definition process this photo into a modern one, while keeping the facial adjustments of the person unchanged
other.brief_zh: 给这张照片上色及高清处理成现代照片，并保持人物面部调整不变

other.name: 万物移除
other.brief: repair only the white masked areas in the picture, no changes should be made in other areas
other.brief_zh: 万物移除 只需修复图片中的白色蒙版区域，其他区域不应进行任何更改

other.name: 移除黑色区域
other.brief: remove the black area, add the background, and leave everything else unchanged
other.brief_zh: 移除黑色区域，补充好背景，其余都保持不变

other.name: 图片去除水印
other.brief: remove all the watermarks or texts logo
other.brief_zh: 图片去除水印｜水印消除 移除所有水印或文字标志

other.name: 生成企业形象照
other.brief: generate an enterprise profile picture with office background, slightly blurred, high definition person in formal attire facing camera
other.brief_zh: 生成企业形象照 根据人物生成企业简介图片，背景设置为办公环境，略微模糊，人物以高清晰度呈现，穿着正式服装，上身，直接面对镜头，以正式的方式呈现。无水印

other.name: 模特动作摆拍
other.brief: model's sunglasses halfway to nose bridge, one hand supporting, looking at lens from above glasses
other.brief_zh: 模特动作摆拍｜模特展示 模特墨镜半滑至鼻梁，模特单手轻托，眼神从镜片上方看镜头

other.name: 生成美式学位照
other.brief: update outfit and background to American graduation photo while keeping facial features unchanged
other.brief_zh: 生成美式学位照 同一个人的特写上半身美式毕业肖像，面对镜头，穿着黑色学术礼服和带流苏的毕业帽，背景为纯蓝色。保持角色的面部特征、发型和表情不变；只需更新服装和背景，以匹配正式的美国毕业照

other.name: 模特眼镜展示
other.brief: wear the glasses on the right side on the model's face, no deformation, material unchanged, high quality
other.brief_zh: 模特眼镜大全｜产品展示 右侧的眼镜戴在模特的脸上。玻璃不得变形，材料不得改变，必须具有高质量

other.name: 模特眼镜侧面拍摄
other.brief: wear the glasses on the right side on the model's face, side shot, no deformation, material unchanged, high quality
other.brief_zh: 模特眼镜大全｜产品展示 右侧的眼镜戴在模特的脸上。玻璃不得变形，材料不得改变，必须具有高质量。侧面拍摄

other.name: 模特眼镜全身展示
other.brief: wear the glasses on the right side on the model's face, side shot, enlarge 4x to show full body, no deformation, material unchanged, high quality
other.brief_zh: 模特眼镜大全｜产品展示 右侧的眼镜戴在模特的脸上。玻璃不得变形，材料不得改变，必须具有高质量。侧面拍摄 图像扩展 请将图像扩大4倍，显示人物的全身

other.name: 图像全身扩展
other.brief: enlarge the image by 4 times to display the full body of the character
other.brief_zh: 图像全身扩展｜图像处理 将图像扩大4倍以显示人物全身，保持其他元素不变

other.name: 通用场景图片扩展
other.brief: expand the image to show more context or environment around the subject while maintaining composition balance
other.brief_zh: 通用场景图片扩展｜图像处理 在保持画面构图平衡的前提下，扩展图像以展示主体周围更多环境或背景信息
